channel.title: ParaTrinity Radio's Podcast
channel.description:
ParaTrinity Radio airs live every Saturday at www.asprn.com in Studio B at 11pm EST and spends 90 minutes talking to guests and listeners about religion vs the paranormal! Hosts Mike and LE will debate and discuss religion and the paranormal.
ParaTrinity Radio is sponsored by Host Your Ghost (www.HostYourGhost.com). Check our website at www.paratrinityradio.com. On Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/Cincinnati-OH/ParaTrinity-Radio/214684100232?ref=ts. Or live Saturday night at 11PM EST on www.asprn.com/studioB.html! ParaTrinity Radio - where nothing is sacred...

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio welcomes John Zaffis
item.description: We post this show with a special dedication in memory of John's middle sister. He and his family are in our thoughts and prayers. On this episode we welcomed John Zaffis on ParaTrinity Radio and spoke with him about his many experiences. Including topics as Amytiville, Haunting in Connecticut, and more! We touched on demonology, the fields progression over 30 years, media's affect on the field and so much more! John's bio: From www.johnZaffis.com: John Zaffis has over thirty years of experience studying and investigating the paranormal. He has had the opportunity to work for and with his aunt and uncle, Ed and Lorraine Warren. This sent John beyond looking for ghosts and hauntings and into studying demonology under the Warrens. This led into John's involvement with cases of possession and exorcism and working with prominent exorcists in this field. Roman Catholic priests, monks, Buddhists, rabbis and ministers. John has assisted and worked with well-known exorcists Bishop Robert McKenna, Malachi Martin and the Rev Jun. His research has taken him throughout the United States, Canada, England and Scotland covering several thousands of cases. Through hands on investigating with other investigators and clergy, he has obtained a great deal of knowledge and understanding of the paranormal and is considered one of the foremost authorities in the field today. Ghosts and poltergeists where among some of his first-hand paranormal experiences, as well as the demonic and diabolical. He has also worked extensively with both spiritualists and psychics concerning how their knowledge is used for channeling, reincarnation (past-life regression), or the calling of the spirits for information, and how they use meditation to acquire the information which they are seeking. Because of his personal experiences with hauntings, ESP, near death experiences and other paranormal activities, he is firm in his conviction that such phenomena exist. John has been featured in the Discovery Channel's documentaries A Haunting in Connecticut and Little Lost Souls. John has also appeared on Unsolved Mysteries, Fox News Live, and many other print and news media events. John is also in the books of Ed and Lorraine Warren GRAVEYARDS and IN A DARK PLACE. John's first book, Shadows of the Dark, co-written with Brian McIntyre, was released in September, 2004. John is working on multiple follow-up books currently, and is lecturing all over the United States at colleges and universities. Visit John at www.JohnZaffis.com or on Facebook. And don't forget to tune in LIVE every Saturday night at www.asprn.com at 11pm EST!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio with Willie "Windwalker" Gibson
item.description: Willie Windwalker Gidbson is a spiritual minister, medium, psychic, energy healer, spiritual teacher, channeler, works with medicine cards, and does cleansings and slearings. He has his own television show on KY public access called "Spiritual Gifts and Wonders". He has also been featured in many magazines and radio shows, and has been seen on several television shows. Willie is a Native American Shaman and has also worked closely with MUFON and UFOs. Additionally, he has written 2 books, "The Shaman Windwalker" and the follow-up The "Soul Warriors". Willie talk about a little of everything on this show. Check his webiste at: http://spiritly.fatcow.com/windwalker/ Check us out LIVE ever Saturday night at 11pm EST and also read more about us and our show at www.paratrinityradio.com. Thank you for listening!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio with Rev. Raea Sunshine (Episode 17)
item.description: On this show we talked to Rev Raea Sunshine about her Spirituality, psychic abilities, and so much more. We even opened up the phone for callers to get their readings. This show is full of great information for everyone, especially those trying to find their inner psychic. Check out her websites at www.washingtonstatepsychics.com and http://lakewoodcenter.ning.com. Also don't forget to check us out at www.paratrinityradio.com and www.asprn.com for the show LIVE on Saturday's at 11pm EST!
item.dc:creator: ParaTrinity Radio

Also don't forget to check us out at www.paratrinityradio.com and www.asprn.com for the show LIVE on Saturday's at 11pm EST!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio with Bryony Macri (Christian Cryptozoology)
item.description: This was an excellent show talking to one of our biggest, most loyal listeners, who is always into religious paranormal studies. She, with her group, study Cryptozoology and paranormal with a Christian mindset. Taking everything how their faith leads them. She also shared some stories of the paranormal and cryto sightings from Australia. Very fun, interesting, and enjoyable show. Visit her blog at http://ccapsg.blogspot.com. Also visit her group's website at http://ccapsginvestigations.com. And find her on facebook at Paranormal unity and Christian Cryptozoology and Paranormal study group. Also visit us at www.paratrinityradio.com. Tune in to listen live every Saturday at 11pm EST on www.ASPRN.com. And as always thank you for your support and loyal listening! We appreciate you all so much; you keep us going.

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 15 with Corvis Nocturnum
item.description: On ParaTrinity Radio we talked to Corvis about vampyrism and Satanism. From the common miconceptions of both to the paranormal beleifs in the Satanism religion. We also talked about the way society treats and views their community. Check out his website at http://www.corvisnocturnum.com. Buy his plethora of books at www.darkmoonpress.com or www.amazon.com. A few titles include Embracing the Darkeness and Allure of the Vampire. Also don't forget to check out our website at www.paratrinityradio.com. Hear this show LIVE on Saturday nights at 11pm EST on www.asprn.com! Also look for us on Facebook and Twitter.

item.title: Our Radio Network....Hear about it here!
item.description: This is a short commercial for our radio network, The All Souls Paranormal Radio Network. You can find us at www.asprn.com and listen to shows like this one and many others, LIVE every night of the week! Check us out at www.asprn.com!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 14 with Deonna Kelli Sayed
item.description: This was an excellent and informative show with special guest Deonna Sayed, Muslim, paranormal investigator, and author. She is currently a member of Haunted NC paranormal investigatio team, and working on the book "You Had Me At Boo!" to be released in 2011. To read more about her check out www.deonnakellisayed.com. And to learn about their group check out www.hauntednc.com! Also don't forget to check our website at www.paratrinityradio.com and to come over to www.asprn.com for LIVE paranormal radio every night of the week! Brand new look and brand new management!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 13 Just Us
item.description: On this episode we had a blast just talking amongst ourselves. We got pretty heavy in several discussions and talked for well over 2 hours. This is a very long episode and does contain some cursing. Be warned. Visit us at www.paratrinityradio.com! Listen Live next Saturday at www.asprn.com in Studio B! Host's email: info@paratrinityradio.com Producer email: behindtheveil922@yahoo.com Thank you everyone for your support!

item.title: PTR Episode 12 with Matt Oxley, Marla Brooks, & Christopher Maggard
item.description: This show took three veiw points, three beleifs and discussed them all! One witch (Marla), one atheist (Matt), and one (semi-?)Christian. The discussion were very imformative, interesting, and perhaps a bit controversal. Take a listen for youself and see what you think! Let us know on www.paratrinityradio.com on the community page! Visit Matt's blog at www.ragingrev.com. Visit Marla's website at www.marlabrooks.com Visit Christopher's webpage at www.tspnorthernkentucky.com Thank you for visiting www.paratrinityradio.podomatic.com. Don't forget to visit our webpage at www.paratrinityradio.com. And tune in to www.asprn.com every Saturday night at 11pm EST for ParaTrinity Radio! Thank you all for your support!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio official commercial
item.description: Produced by Christophe Films, this new commercial is a trailer teaser for our radio show that airs every Saturday night...ParaTrinity Radio...where nothing is sacred. Check out the video and let us know what you think. We hope there are more to come! Check out www.paratrinityradio.com to learn more about us, our show, our guests, and our listeners!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 11 with Marla Brooks returns!
item.description: Tonight we had a very special guest return, Marla Brooks. We went in depth into past life regression, dogma, and so much more. Also we called in a another very special guest midway thru the show. Tune in to find out who. Some excellent information about Wiccan, witchcraft, and so much more. Find out more about Marla at www.MaralBrooks.com. Listen to her show, Stirring the Cauldron, on Thursday night at www.Para-X.com. ParaTrinity Radio is sponsored by Host Your Ghost (www.HostYourGhost.com). Check our website at www.paratrinityradio.com. On Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/Cincinnati-OH/ParaTrinity-Radio/214684100232?ref=ts. Or live Saturday night at 11PM EST on www.asprn.com/studioB.html! ParaTrinity Radio..where nothing is sacred...

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 10 with Rev. Tim Shaw
item.description: This was another incredible show with the wonderful Rev. Tim Shaw explaining Spiritualism, mediumship and more! He answered all of our question before being asked and was incredibly interesting to listen to! This is a must hear show! Listen to Rev. Tim's radio show, The Black Cat Lounge on www.Para-x.com every Monday night! Or check him out at www.blackcatlounge.ning.com! item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 9 with Thomas Durant
item.description: Tonight was an awesome show with a good bit of humor thrown into learning all about shadow people and TAPS Bootcamp. This show delved into working with government, to clairvoiants, astral-projection and more! Some excellent information; a must hear! Check out his show at www.alteredstatespararadio.com! ParaTrinity Radio is sponsored by Host Your Ghost (www.HostYourGhost.com). Don't forget about our website at www.paratrinityradio.com!

item.title: ParaTrinity Radio Episode 8 with Matt Oxley
item.description: This was an awesome show full of debates with Matt Oxley, atheist and founder of RagingRev.com. This show may be offending to some but please don't take it personally. If you don't like our views or Matt's view then don't listen. Otherwise, this episode was phenominal, its a must hear! Check out www.RagingRev.com! ParaTrinity Radio is sponsored by Host Your Ghost (www.HostYourGhost.com). You can also find us at www.paratrinityradio.com!
